article_title: Photos: Landslides in Hiroshima Kill Dozens
article_text: A rescue helicopter hovers over an area devastated by a massive landslide in Hiroshima, Japan, on Wednesday. At least 36 are dead and seven are missing as officials report conditions are making it difficult to know exactly how many were washed away or buried. Kyodo News/AP

article_metadata.title: Photos: Landslides in Hiroshima Kill Dozens

og.description: The ground collapsed so quickly in multiple areas that evacuation advisories came an hour after the first mudslide, officials said.
og.title: Landslides Kill Dozens in Hiroshima

article_summary:
A rescue helicopter hovers over an area devastated by a massive landslide in Hiroshima, Japan, on Wednesday.
At least 36 are dead and seven are missing as officials report conditions are making it difficult to know exactly how many were washed away or buried.
Kyodo News/AP
